extension.description: The type of template to be used.

params.description: Object with values to be replaced in the template.

template.description: Source content in base64 format. Required only if there is no templateFileName value.

templateId.description: Source template file name. Required only if there is no template value.

templateType.description: Source template file name. Required only if there is no template value.
